name: Metropoly
description: What is the project about? Our project aims to create a real estate marketplace where individuals can invest in income-generating properties such as holiday homes and long-term rentals using cryptocurrencies. What makes your project unique? We have published Beta 2.0 on prototype.metropoly.io History of your project. We started our project in the summer of '22 and have publicly developed our unique prototype. Over the last ten months, we have built the ecosystem and garnered more than 3500+ pre-sale investors. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We plan to launch the $METRO token on various exchanges, including XT.com and Uniswap, to attract more people to our ecosystem. What can your token be used for? The $METRO token can be used to buy and sell Real Estate NFTs on the Metropoly Marketplace for lower prices, providing rewards and advantages to those staking them.
